amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 106 of the bill which provides for greater accountability for federal funding for research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in part A of House Report 114-120 to strike section 106 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 243 (Roll no. 252).
